ocrText:
# CADILLAC LYRIQ QUICK START GUIDE

This guide will help you get familiar with the key features of your new Cadillac LYRIQ.
rawText:
# CADILLAC LYRIQ QUICK START GUIDE

This guide will help you get familiar with the key features of your new Cadillac LYRIQ.

ocrText:
## GETTING STARTED

To start your LYRIQ, simply press the brake pedal and press the START button while the key fob is in the vehicle.
rawText:
## GETTING STARTED

To start your LYRIQ, simply press the brake pedal and press the START button while the key fob is in the vehicle.

ocrText:
## DIGITAL DISPLAY

The 33-inch diagonal LED display provides all vehicle information and infotainment controls. Use touch or voice commands to interact with the system.
rawText:
## DIGITAL DISPLAY

The 33-inch diagonal LED display provides all vehicle information and infotainment controls. Use touch or voice commands to interact with the system.

ocrText:
## SUPER CRUISE

Your LYRIQ features Super Cruise, Cadillac's hands-free driver assistance technology for compatible roads. Look for the light bar on the steering wheel to guide you.
rawText:
## SUPER CRUISE

Your LYRIQ features Super Cruise, Cadillac's hands-free driver assistance technology for compatible roads. Look for the light bar on the steering wheel to guide you.

ocrText:
## ONE-PEDAL DRIVING

The LYRIQ offers one-pedal driving, allowing you to accelerate and decelerate using only the accelerator pedal. Release the pedal to slow down and come to a complete stop.
rawText:
## ONE-PEDAL DRIVING

The LYRIQ offers one-pedal driving, allowing you to accelerate and decelerate using only the accelerator pedal. Release the pedal to slow down and come to a complete stop.
